title: Tarea principal: Haz un plan de viaje a Bogotá, Colombia, incluyendo actividades, lugares turísticos, gastronomía y cultura local.
description: Haz un plan de viaje a Bogotá, Colombia, incluyendo actividades, lugares turísticos, gastronomía y cultura local.
intro: I divided the task of planning a trip to Bogotá, Colombia into four functional areas: activities, tourist attractions, gastronomy, and local culture. Each area represents a distinct aspect of the travel plan that requires specialized knowledge and attention to detail.

subtasks.title: Activities
subtasks.description: Planning and organizing various activities for the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A list of engaging and diverse activities to enjoy during the trip.
responsibilities: Research and recommend outdoor and indoor activities suitable for different preferences.
Coordinate bookings and reservations for activities such as city tours, hiking trips, or cultural experiences.

subtasks.title: Research outdoor activities in Bogotá
subtasks.description: Identify and compile a list of outdoor activities such as hiking, biking, or nature parks available in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: List of outdoor activities with descriptions and locations.

subtasks.title: Explore cultural experiences in Bogotá
subtasks.description: Research and recommend cultural activities like visiting museums, art galleries, or attending local events in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: List of cultural experiences with details and schedules.

subtasks.title: Coordinate bookings for selected activities
subtasks.description: Make reservations or bookings for selected activities such as guided tours, adventure sports, or cultural workshops in Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Tourist Attractions
subtasks.description: Identifying and selecting key tourist attractions in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: A curated list of must-visit attractions that showcase the city's culture and history.
responsibilities: Research popular landmarks, museums, and historical sites in Bogotá.
Create an itinerary that includes a mix of iconic attractions and hidden gems to provide a comprehensive experience.

subtasks.title: Research Popular Landmarks in Bogotá
subtasks.description: Identify and list the most famous landmarks and historical sites in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: List of popular landmarks in Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Create Itinerary with Iconic Attractions
subtasks.description: Develop a detailed itinerary that includes must-visit iconic attractions in Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Discover Hidden Gems
subtasks.description: Research and identify lesser-known, hidden gem tourist attractions in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: List of hidden gem attractions in Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Gastronomy
subtasks.description: Planning culinary experiences and dining options for the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A selection of restaurants and food experiences that highlight Colombian cuisine.
responsibilities: Research traditional Colombian dishes and local specialties in Bogotá.
Recommend restaurants, markets, and food tours that offer authentic gastronomic experiences.

subtasks.title: Research Traditional Colombian Dishes
subtasks.description: Research and compile a list of traditional Colombian dishes and local specialties in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: List of traditional Colombian dishes and specialties.

subtasks.title: Recommend Authentic Colombian Restaurants
subtasks.description: Identify and recommend restaurants in Bogotá that offer authentic Colombian cuisine and gastronomic experiences.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended authentic Colombian restaurants.

subtasks.title: Local Culture
subtasks.description: Immersing in the local culture and traditions of Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: Insights into the cultural aspects of the city, including festivals, music, and art.
responsibilities: Explore the cultural calendar to identify events or festivals happening during the visit.
Provide information on art galleries, theaters, and music venues to experience the vibrant local culture.

subtasks.title: Explore Cultural Events Calendar
subtasks.description: Identify festivals and events happening in Bogotá during the visit.
subtasks.expected_output: List of cultural events, dates, and locations.

subtasks.title: Visit Art Galleries and Museums
subtasks.description: Explore local art scene by visiting art galleries and museums in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: Exposure to Colombian art and culture.

subtasks.title: Attend a Traditional Music Performance
subtasks.description: Experience local music by attending a traditional music performance in Bogotá.
